overview: The Decency and Morality League is about to award advice columnist Pam Slanders their coveted "Most Moral Woman of the Year" award. She tells them about her toughest "case;" a man whose stepdaughter, secretary and other women trouble him.
tagline: Got a Problem? Ask Pam Slanders, America's Sexiest Advice Columnist. But Remember, Do As She Says Not As She Does!
title: Dear Pam
